rooms.description: Spacious minimalist living area with open concept design adhering to Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow. Wheelchair accessible entrance and smooth transitions.
Minimalist bedroom designed with ample space for wheelchair maneuverability and a calming atmosphere in accordance with Vastu principles. Placement ensures positive energy from the entrance.
Dining space integrated with the living area for a cohesive minimalist design, with considerations to Vastu by aligning the entrance and dining arrangement.
Compact yet functional minimalist kitchen. Layout designed to maintain smooth workflow and wheelchair accessibility with lower cabinets and open shelving.
Accessible minimalist bathroom equipped with necessary fixtures and handrails for wheelchair users. Designed to ensure privacy while adhering to Vastu norms.
Compact living area for the servant's quarters ensuring privacy and minimal design. Includes basic facilities with wheelchair accessible routes as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Main entrance designed for wheelchair accessibility with a wide, barrier-free entryway.
Large windows placed to allow ample natural light and air flow, aligning with Vastu principles.
Doorway between kitchen and dining area ensuring smooth transition in the minimalist design.

vastu_considerations.room_alignment: rooms aligned for optimal energy flow with main entrance and bedroom in preferred directions.
